# ================== EVOLVE-BLOCK-START ==================
import torch
import torch.nn as nn
import triton
import triton.language as tl

class ModelNew(nn.Module):
    def __init__(self, dim):
        super().__init__()
        self.dim = dim

    def forward(self, x):
        # General implementation works for any dimension
        if x.size(self.dim) == 0:
            return x
            
        # Shift input and pad with zero at start
        shifted_x = torch.cat([
            torch.zeros_like(x.narrow(self.dim, 0, 1)),
            x.narrow(self.dim, 0, x.size(self.dim)-1)
        ], dim=self.dim)
        
        # Compute cumulative sum
        return torch.cumsum(shifted_x, dim=self.dim)

batch_size = 128
input_shape = (4000,)
dim = 1

def get_inputs():
    return [torch.randn(batch_size, *input_shape)]

def get_init_inputs():
    return [dim]
# =================== EVOLVE-BLOCK-END ===================
